Level 52
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 52
By Y.K. TAN on Sunday, May 30, 2004 - 10:43 pm:

Stage 52

There are two ways to win this stage, the normal way or the cheap but effective way. The cheap and effective way is easy, just at the start just bunge the nagas in and after they died, just drop down and obtain the key and than kill yourself by touching the naga, and second time round, come back and drop yourself into the door.

The harder way would result in you going into the metal block at the middle of the stage and destroying the box beneath both the naga producers. Than after that, you would have to bunge the right naga by dsetroying all the boxes there, so they nagas on the right will be stuck. After that, the nagas on the left are left to be trifled with.....

Create a box on the right of the metal block, so that once the nagas drop down, they will land there. If you are quick enough, quickly go down and grab the key and make a box to prevent the nagas to reach you as they will "stand" on the box instead of "being in the same level as the box". After that, make a box to ricochet yourself upwards when the naga die and reach the door to win.
